name: Appcast
description: Appcast is the award-winning, global leader in programmatic job advertising technology. With advanced technology, unmatched market data and a team of the industry's best recruitment marketers, Appcast's technology and services drive hiring outcomes for more than 2,000 clients. In July 2023, Appcast acquired Bayard Advertising, a pioneer in the recruitment marketing space. Appcast is headquartered in Lebanon, N.H. with offices throughout North America and Europe.

enhanced_description: Appcast is an award-winning global leader in programmatic job advertising technology, launched in 2014. It leverages advanced technology, unmatched market data, and a team of industry-best recruitment marketers to drive superior hiring outcomes for over 2,000 clients across small, large, and global enterprises. Their industry-leading programmatic technology efficiently distributes job ads across thousands of sites using source-neutral methods, offering impression-to-hire tracking and optimization that has managed billions of ad clicks and millions of applications. Following the acquisition of Bayard Advertising in July 2023, Appcast now provides comprehensive and top-tier recruitment marketing solutions throughout the entire recruitment process, aiming to help organizations hire top talent faster and more efficiently, reduce the cost of hiring qualified employees, and improve overall employee engagement.
